Package.Name: Colored Crashed Tracks
Package.InternalNotes:
use this prepared package to update this mod:
https://github.com/Relhax-Modpack-Team/RelhaxMCT/tree/master/MCTCreator

Link to the Special Packages Document:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DIYfQwfD46KWA3xLvqONjj_i54SlYy3F0YKZUc_U3JU/edit#heading=h.z7mbufem15s5


HOW-TO for MCT v2

BASE FILES:
This will show you how to create the crashedTracksBase.wotmod and DeadTanksBase.wotmod files. 

step 1.) open mct2_ct-dt_white.bat-file in editor
step 2.) line 3: use your installation path here
step 3.) line 5+6: use your installation path and current game version 
 this will rename the created files to the relhax-default names.
 and it will delete old versions if they are still in the mods folder.
step 4.) run the bat
step 5.) go to your mods\version dir. you will find the MCT.wotmods.
 now you will notice if step 3 failed. 
 if so, you need to manually edit the wotmods names.
step 6.) update the zip with the new wotmods.


COLORFILES:
in some cases the colorfiles also need an update.
in order to do that you need to edit all *.bat files with the correct path/wotversion before running them.
run one bat.
from the created wotmod extract the colorfile and put it into the zip (without wotmod).
run the next bat.
repeat...


ATTENTION:
this mod is using a patch for the "load_order.xml".
this means that there is a reference to the current name of the .wotmod files!
so you have to rename the wotmod or edit the load_order.xml every time after creating.


Dev: https://koreanrandom.com/forum/topic/1578-mctcreator2-однотонные-текстуры-танков-цветные-гусеницы-вагоны-полупрозрачные-камуфляжи-версия-205-дата-01022020/#comments

Configs: https://github.com/StranikS-Scan/MCTCreator-Configs
Package.Description: Helps to easily determine which tanks are dead, or tracks, etc. Usefull for trying to shoot around dead tanks.

Package.Name: Transparent Camouflage For All Tanks (30%)
Package.InternalNotes:
These can be created using the MCT gui application here:
https://github.com/Relhax-Modpack-Team/RelhaxMCT/tree/master/MCTCreator

Set the following settings GUI:
- WOT: Your wot installation to the exe.
- Destination folder: Optional. Set to any folder. The mods will be created here. If not set, it defaults to the WoT install folder

- In the advanced options (wrench icon):
- "Don't download new configs" should be unchecked
- "Full path to the configs folder" -> If the *.cfg files are not in the same folder as the application, specify the folder where the cfg files exist.
- "Don't create wotmod packages" should be unchecked
- "Packed in one wotmod file" should be unchecked
- "Save mods to a separate subfolder" should be checked. Puts mods in a "MCTCreator" inside mods folder
- "Don't include HD textures" should be unchecked
- "Split packages into 2GB parts" should be unchecked
- The rest of the advanced settings are optional

- For TankSkinsMisc_Camo_TransparentCamouflage, create only the "Translucent camouflages" at 30%


Click Create mods and update the wotmod files in the package zip
Package.Author: MTC

Package.Name: Clan Logo Remover [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: Some clan logos may cause a crash to desktop with no python log file
Package.Author: StanikS_Scan
Package.Description: This mod will make the clan logos transparent for all tanks (in battle, not in hangar view). See no more inappropriate clan icons on other tanks in battle.

Package.Name: Colored damage stickers (paintball mod)
Package.InternalNotes:
Mod contains a wotmod with DDS-images.
The files inside the wotmod are from around 2018.
There is also a patch for the load_order.xml.

-> Updates not necessary unless there is a change in penetration-handling by Wargaming.
Package.Description: Allows you to see where to penetrate the enemy better, or see where the enemy is penetrating you

Package.Name: HAWG Regular
Package.InternalNotes: use folder "(1) Red- No Pen,-Green Pen"\r\nold folder "(1) No HE Yellow With Red No Pen"

Package.Name: HAWG Colorblind
Package.InternalNotes: use folder "(1) No HE Orange With No Pen Red"

Package.Name: webium
Package.InternalNotes:
This mod is "deprecated".
An update to this mod can be made with any image-manipulation-program (photoshop, gimp).

-elektro- has already updated mods from tankSkinMisc_coloredPenetration /_MarksOfExcellence /_NationDecals before and said he could try it again if they break.

Package.InternalNotes:
This mods only need an update when new nations are added to WoT.

Last overhaul done by -elektrosmoker- in 2018 and 2019
the one before by -Willster419- in 2017.

Package.Name: KV-2(R)
Package.Author: The Illusion
Package.Description: Makes all tanks have the new KV-2(R) MOE

Package.Name: Various Authors
Package.InternalNotes: These should only need updates when a new nation is introduced (or wg changes their system for MoE display).\r\nIf it needs an update, just copy the 3 marks and rename to the new nation

Package.Name: French by HG_Skins
Package.InternalNotes: New version added for 1.9.1.2 changed how its done. Its a wotmod with xml files now. I added the load_order.xml patch just in case.
Package.Author: HG Skins
Package.Description: this mod only changes the french gunmarks

Package.Name: Nation Decals
Package.InternalNotes: This mods contains only DDS-images and need an update only when new nations are added to WoT.

Package.Name: Limpid Stickers v{version} [by {author}]
Package.Author: goofy67
Package.Description: Makes decals, inscriptions, camouflages and/or clan-logos invisible, configurable for any tank separately.\n\nOpen configuration-window via Modifications-List-Button (lower-right corner in hangar)

Package.Name: Tank Skin Management (Skinner) (Hitzone skins)
Package.Description:
To date, the game World of Tanks has more than 360 types of various vehicles and we meet all these tanks in battles. Most of them have penetration zones, which are located in different places depending on the type and model of the tank. To make it easier for you to navigate in all this, modders have created aesthete skins. Thanks to them, you can forget about constant non-penetrations and ricochets.

Unlike other penetration zones , the penetration zones of esthete tanks do not take up so much space on the tank and, due to this, do not spoil its appearance. After all, a lot of tankers refused to put penetration skins just because their tanks turned into painted boxes, which they really didn’t like. With these skins of penetration, all vulnerable areas will only be outlined with colored outlines and the appearance of the tank will not suffer.

For greater convenience, icons have been added to the contours of the penetration zones, which will indicate the locations of the crew members. Therefore, by installing these skins of penetration, you can not only successfully hit the enemy tanks, but in addition, concussion any crew member without any problems. In our opinion, this is one of the most optimal breakout zones for WOT. The archive contains skins of vulnerable spots for tanks from 4 to 10 levels. This is one of the largest packs of skins with zones of penetration. 

Description of the color of the outlines of vulnerabilities:

 Red is the most penetrable place;
 Purple - the outline of the ammo rack.
 Green - engine outlines.
 Blue - the contours of the fuel tank.

Package.Name: By {author}
Package.InternalNotes: another source:\r\nhttps://yadi.sk/d/CzrP8LIplUDWSg
Package.Author: Polyacov_Yury
Package.Description:
WARNING - Possible issues when using gun sound mods!
>
This mod dynamically edits vehicle model paths, which enables it to selectively apply weakspot skins only on your vehicle, allies and/or enemies. Also it can add so-called “dynamic” skins - the ones that only appear on a vehicle you are looking at. Vehicles affected by RemodEnabler are not processed. All configuration can be made in hangar.
>
Hotkeys (hangar only):
Ctrl+F1 - enables a dynamic skin on current vehicle if it is present. (You need to switch to ally or enemy preview mode, because the player can never have a dynamic skin applied.)
Ctrl+F2 - cycles between vehicle preview modes (Player -> Ally -> Enemy -> Player…).
